verses.text: \w Now|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w clan|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, \w approached|strong="H7126"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w leaders|strong="H7218"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israelite|strong="H3478"\w* \w families|strong="H4940"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* addressed \w them|strong="H6440"\w*,

saying, “\w When|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w land|strong="H5159"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w*, \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* brother \w Zelophehad|strong="H6765"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w if|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w marry|strong="H1961"\w* \w any|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* other \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w withdrawn|strong="H1639"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w portion|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* fathers \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w added|strong="H3254"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w marry|strong="H1961"\w*. \w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w allotted|strong="H1486"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w would|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H1639"\w* \w away|strong="H1639"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jubilee|strong="H3104"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w comes|strong="H1961"\w*, \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w added|strong="H3254"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w marry|strong="H1961"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w taken|strong="H1639"\w* \w away|strong="H1639"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* fathers.”

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w word|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*: “\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w speaks|strong="H1696"\w* \w correctly|strong="H3651"\w*.

\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w concerning|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zelophehad|strong="H6765"\w*: \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w marry|strong="H1961"\w* anyone \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w please|strong="H2896"\w*, provided \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w marry|strong="H1961"\w* within \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w clan|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* father.

\w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w may|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w transferred|strong="H5437"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* each \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* retain \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3478"\w* fathers.

\w Every|strong="H3605"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* possesses \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelite|strong="H3478"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w marry|strong="H1961"\w* within \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w clan|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*, \w so|strong="H4616"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelite|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* fathers.

\w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w may|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w transferred|strong="H5437"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w another|strong="H3808"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* each \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* retain \w its|strong="H3588"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zelophehad|strong="H6765"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w Mahlah|strong="H4244"\w*, \w Tirzah|strong="H8656"\w*, \w Hoglah|strong="H2295"\w*, \w Milcah|strong="H4435"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Noah|strong="H5270"\w*, \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zelophehad|strong="H6765"\w*, \w were|strong="H1961"\w* married \w to|strong="H1961"\w* cousins \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*’s side.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* married \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w remained|strong="H1961"\w* \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*’s \w clan|strong="H4940"\w*.

These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w ordinances|strong="H4941"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w plains|strong="H6160"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w across|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*.
